Website Information

This website is aimed at students living in the Bristol area.
It exists to provide students with information pertaining to Bristol's social scene, pubs, clubs, cinemas etc.

Currently we require companies in the area to provide us with any information they can regarding their business, opening hours, prices, special events etc.

Basically, free advertising !!


You can contact us at Student-Web through the following email addresses :

To make a comment about the site, email : webmaster@student-web.net

If you have some information for the us, email : info@student-web.net

If you require more information about this site, or you wish to place your own information on this site,
email : business@student-web.net
